Text: Your Inquiry Case Number Cc PST Dear Don Baughman Jr Payee Verizon Southwest Payment Amount Date Scheduled Account Case Thank you for your recent inquiry We welcome the opportunity to address your concerns Our research indicates that your payment to Verizon Southwest for has been processed However your account still indicates a balance due As a result we have ordered proof of payment and upon receipt will forward it to Verizon Southwest We will continue to monitor this payment and we will let you know when your account is properly credited Please note You are entitled to receive a copy of any document that we relied upon during our investigation To request documents you can email us or call us anytime at Please provide the Case in your request to ensure that we send you the appropriate documents by US mail Do not reply to this message directly To ensure a prompt and secure response to your inquiry please sign on to your secure banking session and submit your request Thank you Thank you for banking with Wells Fargo
